Title: Relates to creating a stipend program for students and eligible persons earning less than $100,000 per year
Summary: Relates to creating a stipend program for students, unpaid caregivers, and eligible persons earning less than $100,000 per year.
LawCode: Add ยง98, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to creating a stipend program for students and eligible persons earning less than $100,000 per year
